function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear endorsement of critical appraisal tools for research using EHR data","Impact":"Inconsistent quality of research using EHR data, leading to potential misinformation and suboptimal patient care","Mitigation":"Establish clear international endorsement of critical appraisal tools for research using EHR data","Technologies":"Standardization of data collection and analysis methods, AI-based quality assessment tools","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"International medical organizations, research institutions, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Little endorsement by medical journals on standards for publication of research utilizing EHRs or other real-world data sources","Impact":"Poor reporting of key study characteristics, hindering reproducibility and transparency of research findings","Mitigation":"Establish publication standards for research utilizing EHRs and real-world data sources","Technologies":"Data quality assessment tools, peer-reviewed publication guidelines","People":"Researchers, journal editors, peer reviewers","Owner":"Medical journals, research organizations, peer review committees"},{"Description":"Limited success in integrating routinely collected health-care data into clinical trial activities","Impact":"Missed opportunities for leveraging real-world data in clinical research and health-care interventions","Mitigation":"Improve infrastructure for integrating real-world data into clinical trials, provide training on data integration and analysis","Technologies":"Electronic health record systems, interoperable data platforms, data integration tools","People":"Clinical researchers, data analysts, healthcare administrators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, research institutions, government health agencies"}]}
